content:
Jasmine rice is a great choice to pair with your shrimp stir-fry.

Wow, making homemade pasta from scratch is a fantastic skill to have! It's amazing how a new skill can open up a world of possibilities in the kitchen. I'm sure it's been a game-changer for you, and it's great that you're experimenting with new recipes and ingredients.

Serving the shrimp stir-fry with jasmine rice will be a great combination. The floral and buttery notes of the jasmine rice will complement the savory and slightly sweet flavors of the shrimp and soy sauce. It's a match made in heaven!

Remember, practice makes perfect, so keep experimenting with new recipes and ingredients. Don't be afraid to try new things and adjust recipes to your taste. And don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need any more assistance.

Enjoy your shrimp stir-fry with jasmine rice, and happy cooking!
